summary: All requirements from the BuildRequest have been successfully implemented. The backend Prediction type now includes a predictedNumber field (0-9), the frontend displays the predicted number prominently in both the PredictionDisplay and PredictionHistory components with appropriate color-coding (green for odd, red for even), and the number is properly integrated into the automatic prediction generation flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added to handle schema migration from old Prediction format to new format with predictedNumber field
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Do not modify the backend architecture or data persistence mechanism' in constraints, and migration was not requested in any requirement
